DF57960CD7664B058A658D02B6315E29.description: Reflect on attainment of personal goals for effective language learning, including new understandings, skills and strategies.

6C2BD577037B44818432B5A94EC22975.description: Demonstrate the behaviours of effective writers, such as: keeping a journal of ideas, reflections and notes; exploring the creative process as an opportunity to enhance understanding of self, others and the world; enhancing personal texts based on self, peer and/or teacher critical feedback; and, applying the creative process by planning, drafting and revising to create a final version.

1A741C6F85B64FC6B5982D2A867B8EAA.description: Investigate a variety of social media platforms and their impact on personal rights and privacy

4A9B66E19FDE40CD999BB3BA65F079D9.description: Investigate the opportunities, challenges and risks associated with personal production and consumption of, and interaction with, social media.

B8993016CA96468496F613ED8ECB4A03.description: Evaluate representation (e.g., language, culture, ability, mobility, sexual diversity and gender) in advertisements and marketing campaigns.

94CA2B1373974FD6A7B385245F5F4D78.description: Critically analyze the impact of advertising on personal values and behaviours.

67C3ED5270604FF58F9CE558CEAE978F.description: Interpret and discuss the use of language and techniques in a variety of advertisements, considering the personal, cultural, political and historical contexts in which they were created

875162F925F34C1286B62473EA695B94.description: Analyze and discuss advertising techniques, claims and appeals used to target and influence consumers of mass media.

8E7994F8CC764F4EA026B71CEDE97B08.description: Research how industry codes and government regulations impact advertising and marketing of mass media.

BA3B854CD03F4FEC9EB769AAD3672254.description: Investigate the role and power of marketing and advertising in mass media.

E7169A36E1F0448A993C5C09B9180857.description: Examine school-related policies for sharing information and publishing media texts.

8848A3582AF5452295B1A46DF9335A58.description: Discuss legal and ethical issues (e.g., authorship, copyright, ownership, public domain and cultural appropriation) associated with media texts.
